ListItem.Paragraph: Added support for network protocol 18 Source demos.
Skip the Valve logo video when launching Team Fortress 2.
Added support for network protocol 17 Source demos.
Added support for network protocol 16 Source demos.
Added basic support for CS:S Beta demos.
Added the option to remove weapon change animations from HL engine POV demos, which has a similar effect to HLTV models.
"* No Time Limit *" and "Time Remaining: x" text is now automatically removed. Old CS demos tend to spam these messages.
Updated the download URL for old versions of CS maps.
Fixed file system treeview drilling not working correctly with some special folders.
Fixed network protocol 15 Source demos. Valve changed the protocol without incrementing the protocol number.
Minor fixes and performance improvements.
Changed the URL for update check and changelog files.
Fixed misc. svc_tempentity parsing errors.
Graceful handling of inaccessable folders when browsing the file system.
Fixed conversion errors with some protocol 47 HLTV demos.
Added a right-click context menu to certain ListViews, allowing the selected row(s) to be copied to the clipboard as plain text.
Fixed several issues with calculating player Steam IDs.
Fixed CS 1.3 HLTV weapon recoil when playing converted demos.
Fixed a corpse animation sequence bug that affected converted CS demos.
Added optional HLTV demo advertisement and slow motion removal.
Fixed stuck HUD problems when playing some converted HLTV demos.
Fixed TF2 demo reading errors.
Steam IDs are now displayed in the player list for protocol 48 Half-Life engine demos.
Fixed a bug in the handling of corrupt demos.
Added message handlers for the Half-Life engine messages svc_sendcvarvalue and svc_sendcvarvalue2.
Fixed protocol 47 svc_serverinfo bug.
Fixed Vista permission issues.
Fixed incorrect svc_serverinfo parsing.
Fixed a problem where some protocol 46 CS 1.5 demos were incorrectly identified as 1.6, and vice-versa.
Fixed floppy drive seeking on startup.
Added a workaround for foreign language versions of Windows Vista failing to retrieve system icons.
Fixed protocol 45 svc_serverinfo parsing.
Fixed Cheating-Death message removal, it's applied to all version of CS now.
Fixed an crash bug that occured when attempting to load icons for games that don't have a a steam.xml entry.
Fixed several issues with TFC demos.
